| History                 = A global terrorist network dedicated to re-establishing the Third Reich{{r|New Invaders #2}} and armed with the technology of the [[Kalahia|Kalahian]] People. Which allowed them to move through sub-dimensional space like murderous ghosts. There was no border they could not cross, no secret they could not steal. The first phase of their plan was to eliminate key world leaders. Replacing them with bioengineered replicas, called 'Non-Incendiary Adam-Series Synthetics' or 'Synethezoids'. These 'Synethezoids' were created using the same technology used to create [[Jim Hammond (Earth-616)|Jim Hammond the Original Human Torch]] and [[Invader-1 (Earth-616)|Tara]].{{r|New Invaders #1}}
